thread.title: BRIEF-Ceridian HCM Holding Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $200 Million

title: BRIEF-Ceridian HCM Holding Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $200 Million
text: March 26, 2018 / 10:15 AM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Ceridian HCM Holding Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $200 Million Reuters Staff March 26 (Reuters) - * CERIDIAN HCM HOLDING INC FILES FOR IPO OF UP TO $200 MILLION â€“ SEC FILING * CERIDIAN HCM HOLDING INC SAYS IT INTENDS TO APPLY TO HAVE ITS COMMON STOCK LISTED ON NYSE AND ON THE TORONTO STOCK EXCHANGE * CERIDIAN HCM HOLDING INC SAYS GOLDMAN SACHS & CO. LLC, J.P. MORGAN, CREDIT SUISSE ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO * CERIDIAN HCM HOLDING INC SAYS DEUTSCHE BANK SECURITIES, BARCLAYS, CITIGROUP ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO * CERIDIAN HCM HOLDING INC SAYS JEFFERIES, CIBC CAPITAL MARKETS, WELLS FARGO SECURITIES ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO * CERIDIAN HCM HOLDING INC SAYS BAIRD, CANACCORD GENUITY, PIPER JAFFRAY ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO * CERIDIAN HCM HOLDING INC SAYS WILLIAM BLAIR, MUFG ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO * CERIDIAN HCM HOLDING INC SAYS PROPOSED IPO PRICE IS AN ESTIMATE SOLELY FOR CALCULATING SEC REGISTRATION FEE Source text: bit.ly/2G69Jmk
